title: Session 126: Dealing with a Fear of Rejection
itunes:title: Session 126: Dealing with a Fear of Rejection
description:
The Therapy for Black Girls Podcast is a weekly conversation with Dr. Joy Harden Bradford, a licensed Psychologist in Atlanta, Georgia, about all things mental health, personal development, and all the small decisions we can make to become the best possible versions of ourselves.

In today's episode we're digging into the fear of rejection that often stops us from putting ourselves out there. 

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
